tasks.description: API review and breaking change audit - Catalog all public API changes from v10, identify breaking changes requiring migration, review type definitions for completeness, validate backward compatibility where possible, document all changes.

Create migration guide from v10 - Document step-by-step migration process, provide code transformation examples, list deprecated APIs and replacements, include troubleshooting section for common issues.

Generate API documentation - Setup TypeDoc for documentation generation, write comprehensive JSDoc comments on all public APIs, create usage examples for each major feature, generate HTML documentation site.

Performance benchmark suite - Create comprehensive benchmarks for all performance-critical paths, compare against v10 baseline, measure latency percentiles (p50, p95, p99), throughput under various loads, memory usage profiling.

Browser compatibility testing - Test in Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge across versions, verify Web Worker functionality, test SharedArrayBuffer with COOP/COEP headers, validate WASM module loading, document browser support matrix.

Node.js version compatibility testing - Test across Node.js 16, 18, 20, 22, verify worker_threads functionality, test child_process fallback, validate WASM in Node.js, document Node.js support matrix.

Release candidate preparation - Update package.json version to 11.0.0-rc.1, finalize CHANGELOG, create GitHub release draft, prepare npm publish scripts, final CI/CD verification, create release checklist.
